text: Bernay-en-Champagne is a former commune. It is in the region Pays de la Loire in the Sarthe department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Bernay-Neuvy-en-Champagne.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Sarthe
title: Bernay-en-Champagne
